name: Organic Icecream Truck
description: Make ICECREAM for demanding children in this time management arcade game. Feel all the satisfaction of making ICECREAM while also proving your time efficiency skills. As the game goes on, more and more kids will appear wanting your ICECREAM so you better be fast or they will close down your truck forever. Starting is easy with the built in tutorial and recording self improvement is fast as your highscore will be recorded and pinned against your future scores. Have fun creating ICECREAM and making kids not cry!
